settings.title: Settings and Preferences
settings.description: Change your password, set language and theme (light or dark), and view your account information.
settings.accountInfoDesc: Update your account details like phone number, email address, and more.
settings.darkModeDesc: Toggle between dark and light display modes
security.title: Access and Security
security.description: Manage account protection, password settings, and connected devices.
security.notificationsDesc: Choose the types and frequency of notifications (email, push, etc.)
security.devicesDesc: View and manage all devices that accessed your account
security.endSessionsDesc: End active sessions on other devices
security.consentDesc: Adjust preferences regarding data collection and usage
security.deactivateDesc: Learn how to deactivate your account
security.downloadDataDesc: Request a file with all stored data about your account
security.visibilityDesc: Manage who can see your actions like applications and profile updates
security.clearHistoryDesc: Delete search, view, and application history
security.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all related data
